channel.title: Saradomin Brew help!
channel.description: Saradomin Brew give 20 hp, but you can keep like 999m of them in ur inventory ! how i make it so you can hold only 28 on your inventory ?

item.title: Saradomin Brew help!
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

qewrty lol i been trying to help this guy also il make it easyer

search for FileInputStream dataIn = new FileInputStream(new File("data/stackable.dat"));
u shuld c this

[code]

		FileInputStream dataIn = new FileInputStream(new File("data/stackable.dat"));
		while ((c = dataIn.read()) != -1) {
			if (c == 0)
				itemStackable[counter] = false;
			else
				itemStackable[counter] = true;
			counter++;
		}
		dataIn.close();

itemStackable[SARA BREW ID HERE] = true;
} catch (IOException e) {
System.out.println(“Critical error while loading stackabledata! Trace:”);
e.printStackTrace();
}[/code] change the sara brew id to its id, compile dun…

Read full topic

item.title: Saradomin Brew help!
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Under

			FileInputStream dataIn = new FileInputStream(new File("data/stackable.dat"));
			while ((c = dataIn.read()) != -1) {
				if (c == 0)
					itemStackable[counter] = false;
				else
					itemStackable[counter] = true;
				counter++;
			}

in your item class add

itemStackable[itemId] = false; // Replace itemId with the id of the sara brew.

Read full topic
